description: Donkey Kong Country Tropical Freeze is a platforming video game available for the Wii U and Nintendo Switch. It was developed by Retro Studios, an American subsidiary of Nintendo.

The game uses assets saved in a variety of proprietary file formats, including the SKEL format. SKEL files consist of data that describes an in-game character or object's skeleton. Donkey Kong Country Tropical Freeze maps associated textures and animations onto this skeleton, to show the character or object in-game.
